attributes.action: Make the BBC to use our license fee well and keep Martin Brunble as f1 commentator
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we feel that our tv license fee would be put to good use retaining the services of a great bloke and top commentator as lets face it theres few who know the job like Martin

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
